Author: Asteria Nocturna
Name: Divination.AetheryteLinkInChat
Punchline: Quick teleport for mob hunts and treasure hunts!
Description: Display a teleport link to the nearest aetherite for the map link from the in-game chat. Type /alic to configure the plugin.
Changelog:
92955b7: fixed a rare access violation while ExecuteTeleport
a4a0282: Merge pull request #670 from Diyagi/deathfix

[FaloopIntegration] Fix ActiveMobUi death function not being called.
d948983: [FaloopIntegration] Fix events not being removed from spawnEvents on MobDeath
795f163: [FaloopIntegration] Fix ActiveMobUi death event not being called.
c4117b6: no longer necessary to persist MobSpawnEvent
80e4650: Merge pull request #665 from Diyagi/custom_payload

[FaloopIntegration] Remove SpawnRelease handler and fix SpawnState search logic.
f900480: Merge pull request #666 from Diyagi/patch-1

[AetheryteLinkInChat] Change links to be placed before message
42196df: Merge pull request #668 from SlashNephy/chore/set-flag-map-marker

FaloopIntegration: Set <flag> without opening map
7b70f71: proper conversion into world position

Co-authored-by: Diyagi <douglas@diyagi.dev>
0d2610b: clear flag before set one
6d53025: There was no need to call Round()
ecfcc33: try using SetFlagMapMarker
2b84f1c: add FFXIVClientStructs reference
23d8d6c: add copy button
0a0eafe: [AetheryteLinkInChat] Change links to be placed before message
ac3fe87: [FaloopIntegration] Remove SpawnRelease handler and fix SpawnState search logic.
3d8ecf9: use stg branch
394cea1: support spawn_false event
fa86367: update Locations
7e48c88: fix GetInstanceIcon
ccb3516: remove DiscordIntegration.IpcModel from solution
15964b4: use IDalamudPluginInterface
d99765b: support location field in spawn_location event
bcff92f: append zone instance icon even if pop location is unknown
bb07866: extend rank S lifespan
af02bd1: fix null coercing
8d17dfa: display instance icon next to mob name
25c110e: Merge branch 'master' of ssh://github.com/SlashNephy/Divination
9155586: fix zoneInstance reference
0e2865a: Merge pull request #664 from SlashNephy/renovate/dalamudpackager-2.1.x

Update dependency DalamudPackager to v2.1.13

Author: Asteria Nocturna

dd8161f: Memorize player's world
